content:
I am pretty good with:

Python, javaScript

I have experience with:

Erlang, actionscript, Java, C++, C

I can pick up new things quickly and learn whatever is necessary for the task at hand. I also work well in teams and I am great at getting stuff done.

If you are interested in a more complete summary of my qualifications, I can supply a resume on request. Just shoot an email to hi@ingridcheung.com.
